009package imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012
013import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
014import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
015
016/**
017 * Common interface for Perona-Malik filter implementations.
018 * 
019 * @author WB
020 */
021public interface PeronaMalikF {
022        
023        /**
024         * Parameter bundle for Perona-Malik filters (implementations of {@link PeronaMalikF}).
025         */
026        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle<PeronaMalikF> {
027
028                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("Number of iterations")
029                public int iterations = 10;
030                
031                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("Update rate (\u03B1 = 0,..,0.25)")@DialogUtils.DialogDigits(2)
032                public double alpha = 0.20;     
033                
034                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("Smoothness parameter (\u03BA)")@DialogUtils.DialogDigits(1)
035                public double kappa = 25;
036                
037                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("Conductance function g(d)")
038                public ConductanceFunction.Type conductanceFunType = ConductanceFunction.Type.g1;
039                
040                @DialogUtils.DialogLabel("Color mode")
041                public ColorMode colorMode = ColorMode.SeparateChannels;
042
043        }
044        
045        public enum ColorMode  {
046                SeparateChannels,
047                BrightnessGradient,
048                ColorGradient;
049        }
050        
051        public interface ConductanceFunction {
052                float eval(float d);
053                
054                public enum Type {
055                        g1, g2, g3, g4;
056                }
057                
058                static ConductanceFunction get(Type type, float kappa) {
059                        switch (type) {
060                        case g1:
061                                return (d) -> (float) Math.exp(-sqr(d/kappa));
062                        case g2:
063                                return (d) -> 1.0f / (1.0f + sqr(d/kappa));
064                        case g3:
065                                return (d) -> (float) (1.0 / Math.sqrt(1.0f + sqr(d/kappa)));
066                        case g4:
067                                return (d) -> 
068                                (d <= 2 * kappa) ? sqr(1.0f - sqr(d / (2 * kappa))) : 0.0f;
069                        }
070                        return null;
071                }
072        }
073
074}
